plot: After literally walking to Canada from England, Buster takes a cross-country trip across Canada on a railway motorcar (speeder).
title: The railrodder
plot_es: After literally walking to Canada from England, Buster takes a cross-country trip across Canada on a railway motorcar (speeder).
plot_en: After literally walking to Canada from England, Buster takes a cross-country trip across Canada on a railway motorcar (speeder).
